thread.title: Tile One, Inc.
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Tile One, Inc.

author: Tile One, Inc.
title: Tile One, Inc.
text:
Very satisfied with the process of hiring with Zip Recruiter.
The site is user friendly and the price is worth the amount of replies to our ad.
Les was able to refund our account from the hiring date of the Superintendent position that we filled in early January.
An excellent value and suburb customer service. Friendly, knowledgeable and I will not hesitate to reactive my account with ZipRecruiter.
